isPublic.label: Foroba so .
isPublic.description: foroba so bɛ se ka ɲini baarakɛla wɛrɛw fɛ .

allowGuestJoin.label: A to taamakɛlaw ka fara ɲɔgɔn kan .
allowGuestJoin.description: A to baarakɛlaw minnu tɔgɔ ma sɛbɛn, olu ka don so kɔnɔ i n’a fɔ dunan .

isEncrypted.label: Encryption laban-ni-da-baarakɛcogo daminɛ .
isEncrypted.description: Ni a daminɛna, cikan minnu bɛ so kɔnɔ, olu bɛna siri laban-ni-ban .
isEncrypted.alert: Encryption laban-ni-ban bɛ se ka kɛ so kɔnɔ, wa o sigicogo tɛ se ka faga.

toast.error: A ma se ka mɔgɔ dogoyɔrɔw labɛn .
